Type I and type II errors

R 
nr_of_trials <- 100

calc_p <- Vectorize(
  function(effect_size, n) {
    y1 <- rnorm(n)
    y2 <- rnorm(n, effect_size)
    t.test(y1, y2)$p.value
  }
)

calc_p(1, 10)
